mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture_member_inbody ( lecture_member_entrance_record_id, trainer_application_id, weight, skeletal_muscle_mass, body_fat_mass, BMI, percent_body_fat, height, age, gender, inbody_date, last_update ) VALUES ( #{lectureMemberEntranceRecordId}, #{trainerApplicationId}, #{weight}, #{skeletalMuscleMass}, #{bodyFatMass}, #{BMI}, #{percentBodyFat}, #{height}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{inbodyDate}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT lmi.lecture_member_inbody_id, lmi.lecture_member_entrance_record_id, lmi.trainer_application_id, lmi.inbody_date FROM lecture_member_inbody lmi JOIN lecture_member_entrance_record lmer ON lmi.lecture_member_entrance_record_id = lmer.lecture_member_entrance_record_id JOIN lecture_member lm ON lmer.lecture_member_id = lm.lecture_member_id JOIN member m ON lm.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}
